```{r}
aggregate_grid <- function(grid.df, grid.col, value.col) {
  grid.col <- rlang::enquo(grid.col)
  value.col <- rlang::enquo(value.col)
  
  grid.df %>% 
    select(rlang::UQ(grid.col), rlang::UQ(value.col)) %>% 
    distinct() %>% 
    group_by(rlang::UQ(grid.col))  %>% 
    summarize(rlang::UQ(rlang::quo_name(value.col)) := sum(rlang::UQ(value.col)))
}
```
